title: IndyCar driver Ryan Phinny
description:
Ryan Phinny is an IndyCar driver, kart racer, and motorcycle enthusiast. He joins us to talk about how he worked his way from tech to race car driver, why karting is so important, and his new motorcycle venture. 

 

This show is also a video with visual assets paired to the conversation: https://youtu.be/dfaek5KzkLM

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @ryanphinny

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @ryanphinny

 

Check out our merch!

https://www.blipshift.com/collections/the-smoking-tire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
